title: Create static single-page “Business Development Awareness” landing page

requirements.text: Create a static, single-page frontend that reproduces the provided HTML content structure in React with TypeScript and Tailwind: a header with title and subtitle, an anchor-based navigation bar, a main section containing five topic cards, and a footer. Use the following exact section IDs for anchor navigation: share, trading, ecommerce, dropshipping, importexport.

quotes:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Business Development Awareness</title>
    ...
    <div class="card" id="share">...
    <div class="card" id="trading">...
    <div class="card" id="ecommerce">...
    <div class="card" id="dropshipping">...
    <div class="card" id="importexport">...
...

acceptanceCriteria: The app renders a single page titled “Business Development Awareness”.
The top navigation contains links labeled: “Share Market”, “Trading”, “E-Commerce”, “Dropshipping”, “Import & Export”.
Clicking each nav link scrolls to the corresponding section on the same page using the exact IDs: #share, #trading, #ecommerce, #dropshipping, #importexport.
The page includes five visible content cards with the same headings and paragraph content as the user-provided HTML.
The footer text shows: “© 2026 Business Awareness | Learn • Grow • Succeed”.

requirements.text: Style the page in Tailwind to match the intent of the provided embedded CSS: light gray page background, navy header/footer with white text, a slightly lighter navy nav bar, centered max-width content area, and white cards with rounded corners and subtle shadow. Ensure the layout is responsive (nav wraps on small screens, content remains readable on mobile).

quotes:

acceptanceCriteria: Background color is a light gray equivalent to #f4f6f9.
Header and footer use a dark navy tone equivalent to #0d47a1 with white text.
Nav bar uses a navy tone equivalent to #1565c0; nav items have a hover state that darkens similarly to the header color.
Main content is centered with a max width around 900px and comfortable padding.
Each topic card is white, rounded (~8px), has a soft shadow, and has spacing between cards.
On small screens, the nav items wrap and remain clickable without overlapping.

requirements.text: Add one coherent visual theme direction and apply it consistently across the page (color palette, typography scale, spacing, and interactive states), while keeping all user-facing text in English and preserving the meaning/content of the provided sections.

quotes: Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.

acceptanceCriteria: A single, consistent theme is applied across header/nav/cards/footer (typography, spacing, hover/focus states).
No content sections are removed; the five topics remain present and readable.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook/entry files listed by the system (compose around them instead of modifying them).
Backend changes are not required for this static page.
nonGoals: No database/persistence, admin panel, or content management features.
No multi-page routing requirement beyond a single landing page.
No backend canister APIs are required.
